mapper.select: SELECT DRHP_ORIGIN, DRHP_RENAME FROM DRHPPHOTO WHERE HP_NO = #{hpNo} AND PH_CODE = 4

SELECT HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE,HP.HP_POSTCODE,HP.HP_ADDRESS, HP.HP_X, HP.HP_Y,HP.HP_REVIEW, HP.HP_AVG_RATE, DECODE(HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,NULL,'정보없음','00:00','휴무',HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,HT.HP_OPEN_TIME||'~'||HT.HP_CLOSE_TIME) AS HP_TIME, PT.PRO_ORIGIN,PT.PRO_RENAME,PT.PRO_FILEPATH, LISTAGG(CAST(HG.HPCATE_name AS VARCHAR(100)),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY NULL )AS HPCATE_NAME FROM HPLIST HPL LEFT JOIN HPCATEGORY HG ON(HPL.HPCATE_CODE=HG.HPCATE_CODE) LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL HP ON(HPL.HP_NO = HP.HP_NO) LEFT JOIN HPTIME HT ON(HPL.HP_NO = HT.HP_UNIQUENO) LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO PT ON(PT.HP_NO=HPL.HP_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DAY') = HT.HP_DAY AND HP.HP_STATUS='Y'
AND hp_address LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%'
AND HP_NAME LIKE #{hpName} GROUP BY HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE, HP.HP_POSTCODE, HP.HP_ADDRESS, HP.HP_X, HP.HP_Y, HP.HP_REVIEW, HP.HP_AVG_RATE, DECODE(HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,NULL,'정보없음','00:00','휴무',HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,HT.HP_OPEN_TIME||'~'||HT.HP_CLOSE_TIME), HT.HP_OPEN_TIME, NULL, '정보없음', '00:00', '휴무', HT.HP_OPEN_TIME, HT.HP_OPEN_TIME||'~'||HT.HP_CLOSE_TIME, '~', HT.HP_CLOSE_TIME, PT.PRO_ORIGIN, PT.PRO_RENAME, PT.PRO_FILEPATH

SELECT HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE,HP.HP_POSTCODE,HP.HP_ADDRESS, HP.HP_X, HP.HP_Y,HP.HP_REVIEW, HP.HP_AVG_RATE, DECODE(HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,NULL,'정보없음','00:00','휴무',HT.HP_OPEN_TIME,HT.HP_OPEN_TIME||'~'||HT.HP_CLOSE_TIME) AS HP_TIME, PT.PRO_ORIGIN,PT.PRO_RENAME,PT.PRO_FILEPATH,HG.HPCATE_name,HG.HPCATE_CODE FROM HPLIST HPL LEFT JOIN HPCATEGORY HG ON(HPL.HPCATE_CODE=HG.HPCATE_CODE) LEFT JOIN HOSPITAL HP ON(HPL.HP_NO = HP.HP_NO) LEFT JOIN HPTIME HT ON(HPL.HP_NO = HT.HP_UNIQUENO) LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO PT ON(PT.HP_NO=HPL.HP_NO) WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DAY') = HT.HP_DAY AND HP.HP_STATUS='Y' AND HG.HPCATE_NAME = #{cateName}
